app.title: Google Play Music
app.desc: Rock out to millions of songs with Google Play Music in your living room.

app.title: Pandora
app.desc: Listen to free, personalised radio from Pandora on the best speakers in your home.

app.title: Plex
app.desc: Plex organises all of your media, where-ever you keep it, so you can enjoy it anywhere.

app.title: Allcast
app.desc: AllCast lets you send photos, music, and videos on your device to your TV!

app.title: Chrome
app.desc: Cast a tab from Chrome to enjoy online videos, music, photos and more on your TV.

app.title: Quickflix
app.desc: Stream movies and hit TV shows to your favourite screen with your Quickflix subscription

app.title: iView
app.desc: ABC iView lets you catch up on the best of ABC TV.

app.title: Ted
app.desc: Access riveting talks from some of the world’s most fascinating people - wherever you are.

app.title: NBA App
app.desc: The official app of the NBA with games, video and statistics.

app.title: Redbull TV
app.desc: Red Bull TV brings a world of action, adventure and excitement to your device.

app.title: Qello Concerts
app.desc: Full-length Concerts & Music Documentaries streamed on demand!

app.title: NPR One
app.desc: NPR One is a stream of audio stories just for you. Public radio made personal.

app.title: Deezer
app.desc: All your music, all the time and hand-picked recommendations to fall in love with.

app.title: Tune In Radio
app.desc: Listen to the world’s largest collection of radio stations on your phone or tablet, absolutely free.

app.title: Rdio
app.desc: Rdio provides over 35 million songs to discover, play, and share.

app.title: Podcast Addict
app.desc: With Podcast Addict, manage all your audio & video Podcasts, Radio on Demand as well as your YouTube channels and RSS News feeds from your Android device.

app.title: Beyond Pod
app.desc: Play thousands of free audio and video shows from all over the world.

app.title: Songza
app.desc: Working? Relaxing? At the gym? Songza plays you the right music at the right time.

app.title: Alien Invaders
app.desc: Help defend the Earth from alien invaders from space!

app.title: Just Dance Now
app.desc: The world’s #1 dance game is now on smartphone!

app.title: Connect 4 Quads
app.desc: CONNECT 4 Quads, it’s fast paced, checker-stacking fun!

app.title: Monopoly Dash
app.desc: Monopoly Dash, It’s fast dealing, property trading fun!

app.title: Simon Swipe
app.desc: SIMON Swipe, its fast action color swiping fun!

app.title: Wheel of Fortune
app.desc: Step up to the wheel and take a spin through a true Wheel of Fortune experience!

app.title: Emoji Party
app.desc: Play Emoji Party for Chromecast, a fun multi-player quiz game for movie fans!

app.title: Big Web Quiz
app.desc: Big Web Quiz brings trivia night to your TV!

app.title: Karaoke Cast
app.desc: Transform your Chromecast device in your own Karaoke Machine with KaraokeCast.

app.title: UpDown Fish
app.desc: Help your fish swim through the pillars by tapping your device to swim up and down.
